title: A Quarantined Update With a Sprinkle Of Social Distancing with Lauryn Evarts & Michael Bosstick
itunes:title: A Quarantined Update With a Sprinkle Of Social Distancing with Lauryn Evarts & Michael Bosstick
description:
#258: On this episode Lauryn and Michael are solo. Locked down like the rest of the country in quarantine. They give their tips and tricks on how to stay productive and optimistic during this challenging time for the world. They also dive into daily practices that can help during quarantine. 

To connect with Lauryn Evarts click HERE

To connect with Michael Bosstick click HERE

We are all quarantined and spending a lot more time at home. We are also spending a lot more time lounging around in bed. Make sure you have the right mattress to make enhance your sleep.
